mainText.detailsOne: Cardboard Citizens is an NFT project in Solana Blockchain. Our Art is meant to become a profile picture (PFP) that our NFT holders will carry with pride along the journey that awaits!
Cardboard Citizens est un projet NFT sur la blockchain Solana. Notre Art est destiné à devenir l’avatar de nos holders/clients qui pourront représenter notre projet et nos valeurs.
Cardboard Citizens is an NFT project in Solana Blockchain. Our Art is meant to become a profile picture (PFP) that our NFT holders will carry with pride along the journey that awaits!
